content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received a message to execute a shell command, but it returned a syntax error. The AI then sent me a message to execute the "list_files" command with an argument for a specific directory, which returned an empty list. Later, I received a message to execute a Python file, but it returned an error due to an invalid file type. The AI also sent me messages to read and write to a file, both of which returned successful results.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "<filename>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: Error: read_file /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/<filename> failed: no such file or directory', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "<filename>", "text": "<text>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "<command_line>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "<directory>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_file", "args": {"filename": "<filename>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_python_file returned: Error: Invalid file type. Only .py files are allowed.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "<filename>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: <text>', type='action_result')]
"""
